TopicTitle: Advanced options showing the options of settings.cfg

Articles.Content:
Looking at devnotes at @Claw

13 hours ago, Claw said:

There's also an option now in the settings.cfg to disable it completely while in-flight. "INFLIGHT_HIGHLIGHT = False"

I think for a suggestion, why not implement this as an advanced options menu in the settings menu?

The options will be with a checkbox , like

☑ Inflight highlight

☐ other example (I'm not very imaginative today)

Or a numerical box if they are numerical. I think this can be doneautomatically by some script so if a mod adds some setting it can be actualized.

And if you hover the mouse in the option it can display a description like "this option makes that the selected part is hightlited in green etc", this can be added to other parts of the settings menu.

My two cents. Editing setings.cfg is very arcane to new players and to not that new players, we should help them somewhat, and there is also some settings with unintuitive names, description would help a lot.
